title: UG & Dual Degree Admission Notice for August 2025

instructions: Register using your JEE (Main) 2025 application number before physical reporting.
Fill in all required details in the portal.
Upload required documents as PDF files (multiple documents in single PDF where applicable).
documents_required: Admit card of Class 10th / Birth certificate for age proof
Provisional Admission Letter issued by JoSAA/CSAB 2025
Photo ID proof as per Govt. of India guidelines
SC/ST/OBC-NCL/GEN-EWS certificates if applicable (with state-specific requirements)
Migration and Conduct/Character certificate from last attended institution
Annual Family Income Certificate (for tuition fee remission, if applicable, B.Tech courses only)
Medical Certificate as per JoSAA/CSAB-2025 format
GAP certificate (if 12th passing year is not current year)
notes: Make a single PDF file of original documents in the same sequence.
Bring photocopy set of all documents in the same sequence.
Upload a recent formal passport-size photograph.
Save the generated online provisional registration slip for future reference.
Complete online registration before physical reporting.
For queries, contact MIS Section: nitmisagt@mail.nita.ac.in

instructions: Bring the online provisional registration slip.
Bring all original documents and a set of self-attested photocopies.

important_points: Check Institute website for 1st semester fees; fees may change as per Competent Authority.
Candidates not eligible for tuition fee waiver must pay balance fees.
No extension for physical reporting will be entertained.
Induction Programme schedule will be notified later.

instructions: Hostel payment and allotment process will be notified on website.
For hostel queries, contact Chief Warden: chiefwardennita@gmail.com

refund_policy: After last date of withdrawal/cancellation by JoSAA/CSAB-2025, only academic caution money will be refunded.
If a student abandons the course mid-programme, all semester fees are forfeited; only academic caution money refundable.
To cancel admission, apply for No-Dues certificate through MIS account; then apply for release of caution money with No-Dues copy.
approval: Issued with approval of competent authority
copies_to: System Administrator (to upload notice on website)
